VR Monitor
Streamline Your Patient Data Management with Real-Time Monitoring and Alerts

Overview: VR Monitor is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance and simplify patient data management directly within your browser. Ideal for healthcare professionals, administrators, and medical teams, this extension offers seamless monitoring, updating, and management of patient information, ensuring you stay informed and efficient in your daily operations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Patient Monitoring:

Continuously observe your patient list for updates and changes.
Track essential data points such as critical notes, missed appointments, due tasks, and detailed time slots.
Eliminate the need for manual refreshes with automated data tracking.
Automated Diagnostics Alerts:

Receive instant audio notifications (chimes) when significant changes occur in patient data.
Customize alert sounds to suit your preferences, ensuring you never miss a critical update.
Efficient Data Management:

Utilize the integrated Patient Manager to store, update, and retrieve patient information effortlessly.
Categorize data into sections like critical notes, missed appointments, due tasks, and time slots for organized oversight.
Customizable Notifications:

Choose from a variety of notification sounds to personalize your alert system.
Adjust notification settings to align with your workflow and preferences.
Performance Optimized Polling:

Employ intelligent polling mechanisms that minimize impact on browser performance.
Maintain up-to-date patient data with optimal resource usage.
Secure and Private Access:

As an invite-only extension, VR Monitor ensures that only authorized users can access and utilize patient data.
Protect sensitive information with robust security measures and restricted distribution.
Easy Integration:

Seamlessly integrates with your existing web-based patient management systems.
Simple installation and configuration process to get you up and running quickly.
Comprehensive Logging and Debugging:

Enable detailed logging for administrators and developers to monitor observer activities and troubleshoot issues.
Access logs through the developer console for in-depth analysis.
Why Choose VR Monitor?

Managing patient data efficiently is crucial in the fast-paced healthcare environment. VR Monitor simplifies this task by providing a reliable, user-friendly extension that keeps you informed and in control. With real-time monitoring, automated alerts, and robust data management tools, you can focus more on patient care and less on administrative overhead.

How It Works:

Upon installation, VR Monitor initializes by scanning your patient list for relevant data points. It utilizes a polling mechanism to monitor changes at regular intervals, ensuring that any updates are promptly detected and processed. When significant changes are identified—such as updates to critical notes or missed appointments—the extension updates the patient data accordingly and triggers audio notifications to alert you.

Getting Started:

Installation:

Install VR Monitor from the Chrome Web Store via the provided direct link.
Activation:

Upon installation, the extension starts in a deactivated state.
Click on the extension icon and toggle the activation switch to begin monitoring.
Configuration:

Customize your notification preferences and other settings through the extension's options page.
Usage:

Monitor patient data directly within your browser. The extension will handle data updates and notifications automatically once activated.
Support and Feedback:

We are committed to providing the best experience with VR Monitor. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvements, please reach out to our support team at Thoffpau0@gmail.com.

Privacy and Security:

Your trust is paramount. VR Monitor adheres to strict privacy standards to ensure that all patient data is handled securely. As an invite-only extension, access is restricted to authorized individuals, safeguarding sensitive information from unauthorized access.

Conclusion:

Enhance your patient data management with VR Monitor—the reliable, efficient, and secure extension designed to support healthcare professionals in delivering exceptional care. Install it today and transform the way you manage patient information.
